name: Gräuel
storyline: Dive into the darkness of an alternate world where Germany won the Second World War. In this world, secret and cruel experiments are conducted on humans to satisfy a thirst for control and power. You are one of these guinea pigs, held captive in a research and experimentation center, subjected to the terrifying nightmares orchestrated by the sinister Dr. Schmidt and his team of unscrupulous doctors.
summary: GRÄUEL is a cooperative survival horror game for 1 to 6 players. Discover who continues to nurture the horrific abominations of the Nazis and stop them. Survive the crises of the abominations or descend into hell.
